name: Deadheading
description: Deadheading is a free short (I’m talking about 20 - 30 minutes, max) visual novel game about that time you and your three best friends ROBOT, ZOMBIE, and GHOST, went camping in the woods. It’s got CAMPFIRES, it’s got TENTS, it’s got WEIRD NOISES AT NIGHT, it’s maybe got bears?, but it definitely has friendship!
